meanings.sent1: The soft clay was extrudable through the small nozzle.
meanings.sent2: The playdough is extrudable, making it easy for children to create shapes.
meanings.sent3: The extrudable toothpaste tube seemed to have a mind of its own, squirting everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was extrudable, flowing out of her like a continuous stream of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The extrudable material oozed out slowly, taking on new forms as it solidified.

meanings.definition: Able to be forced out through a small opening.
meanings.sent1: The extrudable frosting was perfect for decorating cakes.
meanings.sent2: The extrudable glue made it easy to apply just the right amount.
meanings.sent3: The extrudable ketchup bottle made funny noises as the sauce came out.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was extrudable, bubbling out of her uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The extrudable playdough squished out of the container with a satisfying sound.

meanings.definition: Suitable for being shaped or formed by extrusion.
meanings.sent1: The extrudable plastic was perfect for creating intricate designs.
meanings.sent2: The extrudable metal could be molded into various shapes easily.
meanings.sent3: The extrudable clay seemed to have a mind of its own, forming unexpected patterns.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were extrudable, taking on new shapes and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The extrudable dough was like putty in her hands, ready to be shaped into anything she desired.
